channel.title: Gartner de
channel.description: Daily update of the featured news and research from Gartner de, the world's leading IT research and advisory firm.

item.title: Deciding a Cost-Effective Strategy For The Windows Client OS License - Feature
item.description: In deciding your Windows client OS strategy, you must understand how your company upgrades from one version to another.

item.title: How to Avoid RFID Patent Infringements - Feature
item.description: The intellectual property issues surrounding Radio-Frequency Identification mean that users must clearly define their RFID strategy.

item.title: Siemens kooperiert bei Netzwerk-Equipment mit Huawei - news
Microsoft liefert Open-Source Wiki-Tools f¨r Entwickler - news
Nach CEO-Entlassung weiter Ungewissheit bei PeopleSoft - news
IT Services Opportunities in Telecoms: Europe, 2004-2007 - research
item.description: Telecommunications firms can cut costs by outsourcing key business processes. IT services providers can expect opportunities in areas like revenue management, payroll, network maintenance and equipment procurement.

item.title: Network Services and Service Providers in the United Kingdom - research
item.description: The last two years have seen a restricted spending environment in the U.K. telecom industry after witnessing the boom and bust of the late 1990s. However, the market has begun to show some signs of stability.

item.title: Cool Vendors in Security and Privacy - research
item.description: These 11 cool vendors in IT security and privacy offer innovative technologies and products that address wide-ranging security issues, such as mobile data protection, authentication, spam filtering and database security.

item.title: Innovation Thrives in the Software Infrastructure Space - research
item.description: Innovation continues in the software infrastructure space in the advancement and support of current products as well as in the availability of new technologies.
